articles.description: The Realme Buds Air 3 sounds even better than before and with a myriad of smart features, it spares little reason to spend more on a pair of TWS earbuds.
articles.content: I still remember the day when I first got to saw the original Realme Buds Air back in late 2019. TWS earbuds had become common in those days but nothing in the sub- 5,000 segment could offer the same… [+5320 chars]

articles.description: Apple’s 33W dual USB-C charger images leaked! This is what it will offer for iPhones and the upcoming iPhone 14.
